text: Blacula is a 1972 American blaxploitation fantasy horror movie directed by William Crain and starring William Marshall, Denise Nicholas, Vonetta McGee, Gordon Pinsent, Thalmus Rasulala, Ketty Lester, The Hues Corporation. It was followed by the sequel Scream Blacula Scream in 1973. ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 fantasy movies Category:1972 horror movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American horror movies Category:Blaxploitation movies
title: Blacula
